Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

While this is somewhat of a good Idea, I have another. Since the RPG is being 
discussed of having its "Season ended" I think we should eliminate the rule 
where charachter cannot be killed. When seasons end, charachters die. There 
could be guide lines for it, but still tis better then everyone controling a 
mini god that only dies when its creator wants it too.

~Qs7- Many months and no casualties, but who really wants to go through the 
trouble of flying to antartica and beating down the Vile force who's under a 
frozen area. And who really wants to go underwater at metal crushing 
pressures to fight past the Infecticons bases defenses and then them?

In a message dated 1/20/02 4:57:43 AM Eastern Standard Time, 
Hottie4u2have1@... writes:


> Hey i think we could have a big fight at the end and then the losers have to 
> follow the winners to try to prevent the colonization of the other forces 
> that one. So it would be a sequel.It really wouldnt matter to me though 
> 



--part1_119.b31aeab.297c28c9_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
